Katherine (Kat) Hoffman

I am a biostatistician who is passionate about meaningful and reproducible medical research. I enjoy writing, speaking, and creating illustrations about statistics, programming, and career-related topics. I post new content on Twitter, and I am always open to hearing feedback via email.

Education:
M.S. Biostatistics | University of Michigan | 2018
B.S. Biochemistry | University of Detroit Mercy | 2015

Experience:
Research Biostatistician | Weill Cornell Medicine | 2018-present
